metadata.synopsis: The statues comment on the player's success in the courage puzzle.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Go to S_WYR_CourageTest_Font_0103b0ba-f0de-4492-affa-620ffe73b337 in BGO_Main_A and click on it while standing in the surrounding surface.

0.text: Your courage is a beacon to meek and mighty alike. May you ever withstand the raging elements. Proceed.
